DownShotForce.description: Speed granted when launching with the B button

DownShotOutOfControl.description: Time taken before restoring control to the player after launching with the B button

FrontJumpForce.description: Speed granted when launching with the X button

FrontJumpOutOfControl.description: Time taken before restoring control to the player after launching with the X button

InputTime.description: How long the player has to input a direction

IsDownShot.description: Plays the success sfx/animation when launching with B

IsPathChange.description: Automatically places the player on a new spline if they're launched to one

IsQuestion.description: Displays a question mark as the success button

SuccessButton.description: The button displayed on the jump selector: 0: A 1: B 2: X

UpJumpForce.description: Speed granted when launching with the A button

UpJumpOutOfControl.description: Time taken before restoring control to the player after launching with the A button

UpJumpPitch.description: Angle of the launch on the Y axis after launching with the A button

Extra.name: An object which launches the player in one of three directions, depending on the button pressed.
